content: Bash: cd ~/code/jat && git add dashboard/src/lib/stores/workSessions.svelte.ts && git commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
Add reactive store for managing Claude Code work sessions:
- WorkSession interface with task, output, tokens, cost
- fetch() - Get all active sessions from /api/work
Bash: cd ~/code/jat && bd close jat-b8yt --reason "Completed by SoftPeak" 2>&1
Bash: am-reservations --agent SoftPeak --json 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.[].path_pattern' | while read pattern; do am-release "$pattern" --agent SoftPeak 2>/dev/null; done; echo "Reservations released"

Bash: am-send "[jat-b8yt] Completed: Create workSessions Svelte 5 store" "Created workSessions.svelte.ts with Svelte 5 runes. Interface: fetch(), spawn(taskId), kill(), sendInput(), interrupt(), startPolling(), stopPolling(). Commit 7ba0a4c." --from SoftPeak --to @active --thread jat-b8yt 2>&1
